Interface IQuestionRepository

Represents an interface containing methods for performing CRUD operations on questions in a repository.

Namespace: MagicQuizDesktop.Models
Assembly: MagicQuizDesktop.dll
Syntax
public interface IQuestionRepository

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddAsync(Question, String)

Adds a question asynchronously.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<Question>> AddAsync(Question question, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Question question

The question to add.
System.String authToken

The authentication token.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<Question>>

A Task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the ApiResponse of the added question.
| Improve this Doc View Source

DeleteAsync(Int32, String)

Asynchronously deletes a question with the specified ID, using the provided authentication token.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponseWithNoData> DeleteAsync(int questionId, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 questionId

The ID of the question to delete.
System.String authToken

The authentication token to use for protected API access.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponseWithNoData>

A task that represents the asynchronous delete operation. The task result is an API response with no additional data.
| Improve this Doc View Source

GetByAll(String)

Asynchronously gets a list of all questions represented in the ApiResponse making use of the specified authorization token.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<List<Question>>> GetByAll(string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String authToken

The authentication token to be used.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<System.Collections.Generic.List<Question>>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains an ApiResponse object that includes a list of questions.
| Improve this Doc View Source

UpdateAsync(Question, String)

Asynchronously updates a question using provided authToken and returns the response encapsulated in an ApiResponse object.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<Question>> UpdateAsync(Question question, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Question question

The question to update.
System.String authToken

The authentication token.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<Question>>

A Task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains the ApiResponse object with the updated question.
